entry.title: 90" x 156" | Silver | Premium Velvet Rectangle Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 34.69 - 394.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
Fabric: Velvet
Size: 90" x 156"
Color: Silver
Shape: Rectangle
Edges:Serged
Seamless, 1 Pcs Design
Feature: Soft, textured feel with sheen finish
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

 

Smooth and Seamless

Crafted from premium quality polyester with lush velvet weave, this regal piece offers soft, textured feel with sheen finish. The royal luster coupled with the soft velvety texture make our plush tablecloths a pleasurable accessory to enticingly accentuate your plain banquet or party tables.

Charming Tabletop Spread

Besides being highly charming to the look and touch, these gorgeous spreads are durable enough to continue sprucing your tabletops up for many festivities to come.

Lush Velvet

Spread charmingly atop your colorful or plain table covers, these glossy darlings will heighten the urbanity of your events ambiance. Pair it with matching velvet table runners and napkins and adorn with the velvet rose buds or petals for a more glamorous look.

 

 

Additional Information:

  • Care Instructions: Hand wash in cold water, line dry. Do not bleach/iron.
  • Maintenance: Gently hand wash, spills immediately. Refrain from rubbing the fabric. Gently brush out dried substances. Turn inside out when ironing or steaming. When ironing, move in the direction of the pile. Keep away from direct sunlight to avoid fading.

 Linen Care Instructions

1' = 12" / 1 foot = 12 inches. Typical size for 10-person table is 72" Round Table.

Color: Dusty Rose
Shape: Rectangle
Edges: Serged
Seamless, 1 Pcs Design
Feature: Soft, textured feel with sheen finish
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Care Instructions: Hand wash in cold water, line dry. Do not bleach/iron.
  • Maintenance: Gently hand wash, spills immediately. Refrain from rubbing the fabric. Gently brush out dried substances. Turn inside out when ironing or steaming. When ironing, move in the direction of the pile. Keep away from direct sunlight to avoid fading.

Linen Care Instructions
